article_title: Don't expect a federal gas tax hike anytime soon
article_text:

twitter.title: Don’t expect a federal gas tax hike anytime soon
twitter.description:
It’s been several months since the gridlocked Congress has done anything to damage the nation’s economy. In today’s Washington, that’s considered a winning streak.
But this ...

article_metadata.news_keywords: highway trust fund, congress, ronald reagan, geoge h.w. bush, taxes, gas tax
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Don’t expect a federal gas tax hike anytime soon
article_metadata.description: Nobody has been able to figure out how to permanently fund the ailing Highway Trust Fund. But if history is any guide, raising the gas tax is off the table.
